title: Warlock
content:
level 6 spells. Cantrips: Starts with 2 Cantrips (gains additional cantrips at level 5 & 9) Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier Spell Attack Modifier: your Proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier Known Spells: 1 + Charisma modifier + Warlock level Spell List: Known Casters. Cannot change equiped spells freely. Can only swap equiped spells on level up. Ritual Casting: No

UNIQUE CLASS FEATURE

Warlock Spells Pact Magic: Limited spells slots but always max level
